description: Number of unlabeled 3-element intersecting families (with distinct sets) of an n-element set.
references: V. Jovovic, G. Kilibarda, On the number of Boolean functions in the Post classes F^{mu}_8, Diskretnaya Matematika, 11 (1999), no. 4, 127-138 (translated in Discrete Mathematics and Applications, 9, (1999), no. 6).
author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Goran Kilibarda, Jul 03 2000
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Jul 04 2000
